channel.title: [508] Files
channel.description:
Hello, and Merry Christmas!
I was just wondering, if someone has a tutorial, or atleast a code for a method I could use for "Deleting Data" on a 508 server.
On 508 server's, theres a method used for appending data, which means the Engine creates a file, and store's the bytes and texts within that file. So, when I say "Deleting Data" I mean that if any of you have a method I could use for deleting files, and all text on them.
Thanks!

item.title: [508] Files
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Do you take special medication?

item.title: [508] Files

item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Hello, and Merry Christmas!

I was just wondering, if someone has a tutorial, or atleast a code for a method I could use for “Deleting Data” on a 508 server.

On 508 server’s, theres a method used for appending data, which means the Engine creates a file, and store’s the bytes and texts within that file.
So, when I say “Deleting Data” I mean that if any of you have a method I could use for deleting files, and all text on them.

Thanks!
